definition: "walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
in all parts of (a country)/various regions
all walks of life/all social circles
every trade/all professions/all walks of life

sentences.english: The developmental time of each ramet was basically same.
sentences.chinese: 结缕草无性系各分株的发育时间基本相同。

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 确认各声频设备是否太靠近电视机。

sentences.english: He teaches all liberal sciences and gives account of dead souls that died in sin.
sentences.chinese: 他各人文科学和教给到死，死在仲心灵。

sentences.english: L/C Payment problem is becoming serious to each bank.
sentences.chinese: 信用证垫款问题是各银行面对的日趋严重的一个问题。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the in vitro antitumor action of the different extracts of different solvents from Ganoderma lipsiense.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨树舌灵芝各溶剂提取物的抗癌作用。

sentences.english: The workers phased the various processes in shirt production.
sentences.chinese: 工人们安排好衬衣生产的各道工序。

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可访问关于某人当前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同时诚望与各新老客户通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: It attracted many thousands of visitors from all levels of society.
sentences.chinese: 水晶宫曾吸收了社会各阶级的瞻仰者驻足欣赏。

sentences.english: Each one set of pilot ladder near port and starboard of the main deck shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板的左右舷附近各安装一个引水员软梯。

sentences.english: In the year of the jubilee all shall return to their possessions.
sentences.chinese: 在这喜年内，人各归其祖业。

sentences.english: It has the biggest gap on the audience's satisfaction with comfort of spaces.
sentences.chinese: 观赏者对各设施空间舒适与气氛满意度之差异性较大。
确保各项目包执行赛科标准。

sentences.english: First, we should prepare well for the thematic projects.
sentences.chinese: 一是把各主题项目做好。

sentences.english: Each Ojibwa tribe was divided into migratory bands.
sentences.chinese: 奥吉布瓦人各部落都分为若干迁徙性家族。

sentences.english: The wave form of each main physical quantities are drawn by computer.
sentences.chinese: 还利用计算机绘图画出了各主要物理量的波形图。

definition: a certain number or amount/how many?/how much?
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
in all parts of (a country)/various regions
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
